articles.title: Vijay Hazare Trophy 2020-21: Anuj Rawat, Pradeep Sangwan script Delhi's come-from-behind win | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: Anuj Rawat's unbeaten 95 and Pradeep Sangwan 58 not out, in a stand of 143 helped Delhi to a four-wicket victory over Uttarakhand
articles.content:
With the North Zone side in trouble, Rawat and Sangwan, the skipper, joined hands to not just prop up the innings, but also set the platform for a memorable win. © BCCI
